user_input#0: can you write me a code to sort an array 1,8,4,25,4
assitant_response#0:
Sure! Here's one way to do it in Python:
```python
arr = [1, 8, 4, 25, 4]
arr.sort()
print(arr)
```
This will output the sorted array `[1, 4, 4, 8, 25]`.
user_input#1: can you write me an algorithm that sort that 1,8,4,25,4 arr
assitant_response#1:
Sure! Here's one way to do it using the bubble sort algorithm:
```python
arr = [1, 8, 4, 25, 4]
n = len(arr)
for i in range(n):
    for j in range(0, n-i-1):
        if arr[j] > arr[j+1]:
            arr[j], arr[j+1] = arr[j+1], arr[j]
print(arr)
```
This will output the sorted array `[1, 4, 4, 8, 25]`.
